text:
@PMOIndia @narendramodi Will be waiting & following your instructions as it has helped us in containing Covid19 so far...
But lifting Lockdown will be tricky issue...
Life shall always be placed before economy...
Whatever decision you take dear prime minister,  India stands behind you...
